pages.title: Why Shivalik College
pages.intro: Accredited with an NAAC A+ grade, Shivalik College of Engineering is recognized as one of the leading engineering institutions in Dehradun. Shivalik College of Engineering is also Uttarakhandâ€™s first autonomous private college approved by the UGC and consistently ranks among the top engineering colleges in India.

tabs.label: About Shivalik
tabs.heading: Let Us Introduce Ourselves
tabs.description: Shivalik College of Engineering was established in 2008 by the visionary educationalist, Mr. Sunil Kumar, under the Rijan Educational Society, a non-profit organization that aims solely to deliver world-class education and build the resources needed to ensure quality learning for all. Today, after more than 17 years of academic excellence, Shivalik College of Engineering has expanded to the following colleges:

tabs.label: Why Shivalik
tabs.heading: 10 Reasons to Study at Shivalik College

cards.title: NAAC A+ Graded College
cards.body: Shivalik College of Engineering, a NAAC A+ accredited institute, offers world-class education. Our NAAC accreditation demonstrates unmatched standards of quality education, faculty expertise, and holistic student development.

cards.title: Affiliations, Accreditations, and Recognition
cards.body: We are approved by AICTE and PCI, affiliated with UTU, SDSUU and UBTER, and recognised by the MHRD to ensure every course meets recognised standards of quality and global benchmarks for education.

cards.title: Industry-Standard Learning Environment
cards.body: At Shivalik College, Dehradun, we transform educational standards through collaborative learning, research opportunities, skill development programs, and a student-centric approach to raise academic standards to unmatchable levels.

cards.title: Top Engineering College Focusing on Research
cards.body: We offer exciting research opportunities through initiatives like Shivalik iHub, CBII, tech fests, and science championships, with collaborations with top-leading businesses for the best research opportunities.

cards.title: Impressive Placement Records
cards.body: Shivalik College, Dehradun, has a 92% placement record, ensuring every student gets the best career opportunities. Our placement cell works in close collaboration with top companies for a bright future.

cards.title: World-Class Faculty
cards.body: Our faculty members help shape the future of our students. Academic experts with years of experience bring world-class academic standards to our campus, dedicatedly working to achieve great success.

cards.title: Students Are The First Priority
cards.body: We follow a student-centric approach to make our academic curriculum more effective for upcoming industry leaders. Along with absolute focus on academics, students receive opportunities to grow holistically with extra-curricular activities.

cards.title: Campus: The Ground to Grow, Connect, and Succeed
cards.body: Shivalik College has a vast campus equipped with all necessary facilities including luxurious hostels, sports arena, cafeteria, and laboratories with cutting-edge technology in a welcoming and vibrant environment.

cards.title: Affordability: Higher Education Accessible to All
cards.body: Shivalik College aims to make higher education accessible to all and ensure the best return on educational investment. We offer a broad spectrum of courses that offer value for money.

cards.title: Holistic Development
cards.body: Our expert faculty members from the top engineering college in Dehradun are dedicated to helping students achieve holistic growth through rigorous academics and extra-curricular activities with experiential learning and personalised training.

tabs.label: Legacy
tabs.heading: Legacy of Excellence, Vision for Tomorrow
tabs.description:
Legacy of Excellence, Vision for Tomorrow

At Shivalik College of Engineering, Dehradun, we strive to foster a shared spirit of cooperation, innovation, and enterprise for a better world. We aim to build a vital community in academia with our students, staff, alumni, and researchers. We offer world-class courses that highlight flexibility, experiential learning, and interdisciplinary orientation.

With our comprehensive approach to education, we encourage our students to access unmatchable standards of education, explore their interests, and secure their future with the best career opportunities. Additionally, our teaching strategies focus on grooming students to be socially sensitive through challenging academics and exposure to diverse contemporary cultures.
